mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Tyler, Robert, 1816-1877
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Has heard that his brother John is urging Wise to suggest Robert's name to Mr. Buchanan for a cabinet position; Tyler will not accept a position although Tyler likes Buchanan, he warns Wise to guard his [HW] honor and secure "Southern rights." Autograph Letter Signed. Including Typewritten Copyof the above Autograph Letter Signed.
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter, 1856 November 27, Robert Tyler, Philadelphia, Pennsylvania to Henry A. Wise
